title: Grammys adele beyonce hello song of the year lifest : Music, News - India Today
text:
Grammys adele beyonce hello song of the year lifest 
Adele creates magic at the 59th Grammy Awards. IndiaToday.in | Posted by Mini Dixit Photo: Reuters 
Adele is turning out to be the big winner at this year's Grammy Awards. 
The songstress who's already won two awards including Best Pop Vocal Album and Best Pop Solo Performance has now won the coveted Song of the Year award for her blockbuster track, Hello. 
Adele kicked off this year's Grammys with a stellar rendition of the popular track and also paid a musical tribute to late singer, George Michael.
